ruleBookInfo.author:
li:matches(作者)@text||
p:matches(作者)@text||
div:not(:has(div)):matches(作者)@text
##作者：|简介.*
ruleBookInfo.intro:
li:matches(简介)@all||
p:matches(简介)@all||
div:not(:has(div)):matches(简介)@all
ruleBookInfo.name: title@text##\(.*|_.*|-.*|最新.*|无弹窗.*|完整.*|\:.*|全集.*|全文.*|免费.*|章节.*|免费.*|小说.*|,.*|txt.*
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
a:matches(目录|列表|章节)@href||
div:containsOwn(目录)@a@href

ruleExplore.bookList: @css:*:has(>*:nth-of-type(6)):not(:matches(分类|排行|返回|日点击|访问榜|评论|密码|推荐))>*
ruleExplore.name: a@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
*[class~=cha|read|table|book|panel]@a||
*[id~=cha]@a||
*:has(>ul):matches(第|章|Chapter|直达页面底部)@ul@a||
div:containsOwn(章)@a||
*:not(:has(div)):has(>*:has(>a)):matches(第|章|Chapter|直达页面底部)@a
